page.title: 10SOCIAL CONCERNS,EMPLOYMENT
page.content: All the employees of{Broadway {Workshop,}situated in Abbots Cross estate, are mentally handicapped with ages ranging from 19 to 63. The stitching department makes curtains, gowns and sheets to be used at the Whiteabbey and Royal Victoria Hospitals. The packaging department helps these hospitals by bagging first-aid equipment. It also packs health foods which involves making polythene bags, weighing the food,sealing and labelling the bags. These bags are distributed throughout shops in N.I. The gardening groups help with the maintenance of the grounds at the hospitals and old peoples' homes. The woodwork department repairs garden furniture and makes bath seats. We were impressed by the high standard of work and happy atmosphere.
